column4: hi does anyone know why the movies in www.quicksilverscreen.com don't play with sound i'm using gutsy gibbon flash is installed
sound is ok cds play on it
hi does anyone know why the movies in www.quicksilverscreen.com don't play with sound i'm using gutsy gibbon flash is installed
ok
Do other sounds work?
Does YouTube play?
With sound, that is?
It's installed by default.
Totem is a front-end to gstreamer, which is also installed by default.
Okay, flash probably isn't your problem then.
However, the video you're trying to watch on silverscreen isn't a flash video.
on the SilverScreen site, right click the movie and hit Open in Movie Player
In that case, right click the movie in the web page and click Open with "Movie Player"
Hmm... that's strange. Are you using Gutsy?
What is in the right click menu?
What options are available?
Like, more than two or three?
For me it's got Open with "Movie Player", Copy, Fullscreen, and About. Do you have those?
How about any of the others?
I'm not sure, but I would start by searching for divx in synaptic.
Or search in add/remove programs.
